stanza.line: Thy bosom is endeared with all heartshearts
Which I by lacking have supposed deaddead
And there reigns love and all love loving partsparts
And all those friends which I thought buriedburied
How many a holy and obsequious teartear
Hath dear religious love stoln from mine eyeeye
As interest of the dead which now appearappear
But things removed that hidden in thee lielie
Thou art the grave where buried love doth livelive
Hung with the trophies of my lovers gonegone
Who all their parts of me to thee did givegive
That due of many now is thine alonealone
Their images I loved I view in theethee
And thou (all they) hast all the all of meme
